pullRequest.title: Fix: Preventing addition of any empty cells with whitespaces while importing Xml Data with Tests #1095
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes the issue while importing XML data containing whitespace characters generating empty cells in the table.
Contains Unit Tests for the Fix

commit.message: Fix: Preventing addition of any empty cells with whitespaces while importing Xml data with Tests : Issue #1095

nodes.bodyText: Instead of introducing our own regex here, perhaps we could use CharMatcher.whitespace() just like in other places in the code (see for instance main/src/com/google/refine/expr/functions/strings/Trim.java).

commit.message: Chore: Using 'CharMatcher' to match whitespace pattern instead of using custom regex : Issue #1095
